nodes.bodyText: Please undo, this is used externally.

How about:
 KafkaPlugin kafkaPlugin = new KafkaPlugin(combine(
                    extensions,
                    installModuleIf(
                            KafkaConfig.class,
                            kafkaConfig -> kafkaConfig.getTableDescriptionSupplier().equalsIgnoreCase(TEST),
                            binder -> binder.bind(TableDescriptionSupplier.class)
                                    .toInstance(new MapBasedTableDescriptionSupplier(topicDescriptions))),
                    new AvroModule()));

?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -161,18 +172,13 @@ private static DistributedQueryRunner createKafkaQueryRunner(
                     .putAll(tpchTopicDescriptions)
                     .putAll(testTopicDescriptions.build())
                     .build();
-            KafkaPlugin kafkaPlugin = new KafkaPlugin(combine(
-                    extensions,
-                    installModuleIf(
-                            KafkaConfig.class,
-                            kafkaConfig -> kafkaConfig.getTableDescriptionSupplier().equalsIgnoreCase(TEST),
-                            binder -> binder.bind(TableDescriptionSupplier.class)
-                                    .toInstance(new MapBasedTableDescriptionSupplier(topicDescriptions)))));

nodes.bodyText:
I don't like it. I haven't noticed that earlier, I am sorry about it.
Previously DecoderModule was self contained. Now it has a dependency that you need to provide externally AvroModule. That could be non intuitive. Maybe let's make DecoderModule constructor to accept a module that is expected to provide Avro decoders, then default constructor just use AvroDecoderModule. WDYT? Then you don't need to change other connectors.
This class is not yet used in this PR.

Please change commit message to:
Extract AvroDecoderModule

Also describe why you are doing this, where you can say that this allows to use different implementation of avro decoders etc.

commit.message:
Extract AvroDecoderModule

Extracting AvroDecoderModule to allow different
implementations of decoding avro data.

afterCommit.message:
Extract AvroDecoderModule

Extracting AvroDecoderModule to allow different
implementations of decoding avro data.
